column1: This setting enables/disables the stock bars on the front-end.
column2: This setting enables/disables the stock bars on the front-end.

column1: This setting allows you to display the stock status on the chosen pages.
column2: This setting allows you to display the stock status on the chosen pages.

column1: If enabled, the "In Stock" message will be shown on the front-end.
column2: If enabled, the "In Stock" message will be shown on the front-end.

column1: This message will be shown on the front-end, when a product stock is more than "Low Stock Level".
column2: This message will be shown on the front-end, when a product stock is more than "Low Stock Level".

column1: If enabled, the "Low Stock" message will be shown on the front-end.
column2: If enabled, the "Low Stock" message will be shown on the front-end.

column1: This message will be shown on the front-end, when a product stock triggers the "Low Stock Level".
column2: This message will be shown on the front-end, when a product stock triggers the "Low Stock Level".

column1: This setting defines whether to use native product setting to set the "Low Stock" value or to specify a custom value. If the option to use Magento 2 setting is selected, the extension will check the stock value specified in the "Notify for Quantity Below" setting in the "Advanced Inventory" window for each product.
column2: This setting defines whether to use native product setting to set the "Low Stock" value or to specify a custom value. If the option to use Magento 2 setting is selected, the extension will check the stock value specified in the "Notify for Quantity Below" setting in the "Advanced Inventory" window for each product.

column1: This setting allows you to define a stock value, which should trigger the "Low Stock" functionality.
column2: This setting allows you to define a stock value, which should trigger the "Low Stock" functionality.

column1: If enabled, the "Urgent Stock" message will be shown on the front-end.
column2: If enabled, the "Urgent Stock" message will be shown on the front-end.

column1: This message will be shown on the front-end, when a product stock triggers the "Urgent Stock Level".
column2: This message will be shown on the front-end, when a product stock triggers the "Urgent Stock Level".

column1: This setting defines a stock level, when the urgency flow should be triggered.
column2: This setting defines a stock level, when the urgency flow should be triggered.
